messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2216
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/9/02 7:04:03 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/9/02 7:04:03 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< I
steadfastly refuse to buy anything from a child (or adult for that
matter) that goes to support a school, don't they have enough of our
paycheck? >>

Have you guys been in schools lately? I live in Chicago and they are pretty
pitiful. And we know lots of people going to them every day. Just as I don't
want to sacrifice my own kids by sending them to school so that I can help
fix a system that will take several children's lifetimes to fix, I happily
support my local public school so that the children I love can have a better
experience right now.

Paula
